name: Towsif Muhtadi Khan
description: I am a Frontend Developer and UI/Graphics Designer, focused on creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces that blend functionality and aesthetics. My passion lies in delivering seamless, user-centric digital experiences.
aboutMe: I am a Computer Science graduate specializing in frontend development and UI/graphics design. With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I create responsive, user-friendly interfaces that blend functionality with aesthetics. My passion for UI/UX design helps me craft visually appealing digital experiences, ensuring a seamless user journey. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams, merging design and development to deliver high-quality web applications. I'm continuously learning and striving to push the boundaries of design and technology.

experiences.description: Enhancing user experiences and developing skills while working at Sense & Respond Software LLC.
Enhancing user experiences and developing skills while working at CPSD Technologies Ltd.
